about.title: About Me
about.name: Eita Horishita
about.introduction: I am a specialist in technical research for Science, Technology and Innovation (STI) strategy, with applied expertise in geospatial information systems (GIS) and urban environment management. In my current role, I focus on open innovation, technology foresight, and intellectual property landscape analysis, having led over 30 major projects for private-sector clients in areas such as autonomous mobility and decarbonization. Previously, I contributed to more than 10 international technical cooperation projects on GIS and urban infrastructure management, commissioned by organizations including JICA and the World Bank.
about.brief_history: After graduating from Chiba University Faculty of Engineering, I obtained a Master's degree in International Development from the University of Birmingham, UK. Currently, I work at VALUENEX Japan, engaged in technology trend analysis and strategic support services for private companies.
